task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 12 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Build the main processor that handles different types of webhook events
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create src/processors/webhookProcessor.ts 2. Implement event type routing logic 3. Add event validation and sanitization 4. Create processor for each supported event type 5. Add error handling and fallback mechanisms 6. Implement event deduplication

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-12): Create webhook event processor

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test processing of various webhook event types and verify proper handling
